sentences.sentence: Along the blacktop, trees are bearded as old men.
sentences.translation: 沥青路边，树长着胡子，像老人。

sentences.sentence: He can be without fun, prim ground to follow mom to go on even blacktop only.
sentences.translation: 他只能毫无乐趣、规规矩矩地跟着妈妈走在平坦的柏油路上。

sentences.sentence: Jay slammed into me from behind and sent me sprawling across the blacktop of the alley.
sentences.translation: Jay从我身后猛的一推，我就冲着胡同里的柏油路飞了去。
